extends org.broadinstitute.barclay.help.DefaultDocWorkUnitHandler

      • getDescription

        protected java.lang.String getDescription(org.broadinstitute.barclay.help.DocWorkUnit currentWorkUnit)
        Uses different descriptions depending on the work unit content. The first non-empty of: 1. Default method to capture the javadoc description. 2. CommandLineProgramProperties.summary() for tools. 3. DocumentedFeature summary. Otherwise, the description will be empty.
        Overrides:
        getDescription in class org.broadinstitute.barclay.help.DefaultDocWorkUnitHandler

      • getDestinationFilename

        public java.lang.String getDestinationFilename(org.broadinstitute.barclay.help.DocWorkUnit workUnit)
        Uses the name for the unit with the Markdonw suffix (.md).

        WARNING: does not honor the output extension (should be fixed in the future).

        Overrides:
        getDestinationFilename in class org.broadinstitute.barclay.help.DocWorkUnitHandler
